## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balanceOf(address)](./sdk.splitsmodule.balanceof.md) |  | Get Funds owed to a particular wallet |
|  [balanceOfAllRecipients()](./sdk.splitsmodule.balanceofallrecipients.md) |  | Returns all the recipients and their balances in the native currency. |
|  [balanceOfToken(walletAddress, tokenAddress)](./sdk.splitsmodule.balanceoftoken.md) |  | Get non-native Token Funds owed to a particular wallet |
|  [balanceOfTokenAllRecipients(tokenAddress)](./sdk.splitsmodule.balanceoftokenallrecipients.md) |  | Returns all the recipients and their balances in a non-native currency. |
|  [distribute()](./sdk.splitsmodule.distribute.md) |  | Distribute Funds |
|  [distributeToken(tokenAddress)](./sdk.splitsmodule.distributetoken.md) |  | Distribute Funds |
|  [getAddress()](./sdk.splitsmodule.getaddress.md) |  |  |
|  [getAllRecipients()](./sdk.splitsmodule.getallrecipients.md) |  | Get Recipients of this splits module |
|  [getRecipientSplitPercentage(address)](./sdk.splitsmodule.getrecipientsplitpercentage.md) |  | Get the % of funds owed to a given address |
|  [onNetworkUpdated(network)](./sdk.splitsmodule.onnetworkupdated.md) |  |  |
|  [withdraw(walletAddress)](./sdk.splitsmodule.withdraw.md) |  | Triggers a transfer to account of the amount of native currency they are owed. |
|  [withdrawToken(walletAddress, tokenAddress)](./sdk.splitsmodule.withdrawtoken.md) |  | Triggers a transfer to account of the amount of a given currency they are owed. |
